badge_template_activities.title: Earn a GIAC Certification
Select a topic directly related to GIAC certification
Submit application form & fee with proposed abstract
Work with assigned Gold Advisor to develop paper
Earn Gold Advisor endorsements on final paper
Paper published in SANS Reading Room

50fddcdf-4abd-42b4-a23c-3a44c31ede8d.description: GASF certificated professionals have demonstrated that they are qualified to perform forensic examinations on devices such as mobile phones and tablets. Candidates are required to demonstrate an understanding of the fundamentals of mobile forensics, device file system analysis, mobile application behavior, event artifact analysis and the identification and analysis of mobile device malware.
50fddcdf-4abd-42b4-a23c-3a44c31ede8d.name: GIAC Advanced Smartphone Forensics (GASF)

issuer.summary: issued by Global Information Assurance Certification (GIAC)

alignments.name: ANAB Accredited ISO/IEC 17024 Personnel Certification Body
alignments.description: ANAB accreditation is generally recognized as the highest standard in personnel certification accreditation.

badge_template_activities.title: Candidate submits application for certification attempt
Accept GIAC's Code of Ethics
Acquire skills via industry experience or from a training course
Proctored high stakes exam

f9068b21-f633-408f-8c16-476940614e26.description: GCPN holders have demonstrated their ability to execute effective penetration-testing methodologies in various cloud environments. Professionals holding the GCPN are qualified for job duties involving penetration tests on cloud environments, mapping cloud environment infrastructures, and evaluating security considerations in the design of cloud-native applications.
f9068b21-f633-408f-8c16-476940614e26.name: GIAC Cloud Penetration Tester (GCPN)

issuer.summary: issued by Global Information Assurance Certification (GIAC)

ce5d30bb-fea8-4cb1-92b0-3c71b041807a.description: GSOC holders have demonstrated the ability to work in modern Security Operations Centers and cyber defense teams. They understand the models, processes, tools, and data needed to excel in an enterprise security monitoring environment. The GSOC focuses on the collection, automation, enrichment, and analysis of data and logs to improve the security of an enterprise. Those holding the GSOC are qualified for hands-on and leadership roles within Security Operations Centers and cyber defense teams.
ce5d30bb-fea8-4cb1-92b0-3c71b041807a.name: GIAC Security Operations Certified (GSOC)
